overview: This example demonstrates how to create OpenCL subdevices which uses a single kernel multiple times in order to show how to handle each instance independently including independent buffers, command queues and sequencing.

containers.name: krnl_vadd
containers.ldclflags: --sp krnl_vadd_1.m_axi_gmem:DDR[0] --sp krnl_vadd_2.m_axi_gmem:DDR[1] --sp krnl_vadd_3.m_axi_gmem:DDR[0] --sp krnl_vadd_4.m_axi_gmem:DDR[1] --sp krnl_vadd_5.m_axi_gmem:DDR[0] --sp krnl_vadd_6.m_axi_gmem:DDR[1] --sp krnl_vadd_7.m_axi_gmem:DDR[0] --sp krnl_vadd_8.m_axi_gmem:DDR[1]
